original_text: As soon as he had finished speaking to Saul, the soul of Jonathan was knit to the soul of David, and Jonathan loved him as his own soul.
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 말하기를 마치매 요나단의 마음이 다윗의 마음과 하나가 되어 요나단이 그를 자기 생명 같이 사랑하니라

sentences.original_text: As soon as he had finished speaking to Saul
the soul of Jonathan was knit to the soul of David
Jonathan loved him as his own soul
